amendment.description: Amendment preserves the ability of the Puerto Rico Commission for the Comprehensive Audit of the Public Debt to continue its work in analyzing the legality of certain debts issued by the Commonwealth, and allow the government of Puerto Rico or the Oversight Board to act upon any determination by the Commission.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 114-610 to preserve the ability of the Puerto Rico Commission for the Comprehensive Audit of the Public Debt to continue its work in analyzing the legality of certain debts issued by the Commonwealth, and allow the government of Puerto Rico or the Oversight Board to act upon any determination by the Commission.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Serrano amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Serrano.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Serrano amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
